scripts.build:scripts: browserify assets/js/index.js -p [ minifyify --no-map ] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -o js/index.js
scripts.build:styles: postcss -u autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' -u cssnano -o css/index.css assets/css/index.css
scripts.build: node captain-reload.js --extract && npm run build:scripts -s && npm run build:styles
scripts.watch:scripts: watchify assets/js/index.js -p [ minifyify --no-map ] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -o js/index.js
scripts.watch:styles: postcss -w -u autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' -u cssnano -o css/index.css assets/css/index.css
scripts.dev: node captain-reload.js --inject && npm run open:dev -s && parallelshell "npm run live-reload -s" "npm run serve -s" "npm run watch -s"
